sources.title: Secrets of Chinatown (1935) MYSTERYâ™ THRILLER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Nick Stuart, Lucile Browne, Raymond Lawrence
Director: Fred C. Newmeyer

When a pair of private detectives, Donegal Dawn and Robert Rand, investigate a crime wave that has hit Vancouver's Chinatown, they uncover an enigmatic cult known as "The Black Robe." But Rand's objectivity is lost when he falls in love with Zenobia, the high priestess of the cabal.

metadata.Plot: Private detective Donegal Dawn, is summoned by the police commissioner to solve the reasons for a crime wave in Chinatown, and scoffs at the official ruling on tong-killings. His friend, Robert Rand, has has fallen for Zenobia, a clerk at Chan Tow Ling;s curio shop. Dawn tells Robert that their live would be in peril if he tries to take Zenobia away from Chinatown. That night, Robert breaks into the shop's cellar where he hears strange music and voices, and sees a weird ceremony in which (the mesmerized) Zenobia officiates as a priestess. Robert is captured by the worshipers. Dawn tracks the sinister "Order of the Black Rober" but can not find a trace of Robert, Zenobia or the cultists.
metadata.Actors: Nick Stuart, Lucile Browne, Raymond Lawrence
